    • Class simpletask.main.entities.Task extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8072249000932772481L

      • Serialized Fields

        • complete

          boolean complete
          Flag to mark if task is complete.

        • description

          java.lang.String description
          Description of task.

        • dueDate

          java.time.LocalDateTime dueDate
          Due date of task.

        • importance

          byte importance
          Importance of task. From 1-10. Using byte to minimise storage

        • name

          java.lang.String name
          Name of task.

        • parent

          Workspace parent
          Parent of current task. This is generally used to keep track of the current task, i.e. todo, in progress, Assignment 1 etc.

        • tasks

          java.util.ArrayList<Workspace> tasks
          A list of tasks maintianed by current task. For a task to be marked as complete, all its tasks must be marked as complete
